column4: Ugh -- I cannot figure out why Flash wont work -- I've installed the flash-nonfree package and the flash from Adobe's site
It refuses to work in Opera and Firefox
How do I get flash working for Firefox?  Something is borked.  I have flash-nonfree installed, and I installed the .deb from Adobe's site.  Any ideas?
i installed it from adobe.com no prob... 32bit
